name: T - Sonia Alexis
_source: speak;Alexis; Hey there, lady!{w} I like how you swing that axe!{w} Who trained you?
speak;Alexis; Hmph, we'll see who's so little when I give you a good jab!
speak;Sonia; Woah there, let's get the battle done, then we'll have a good arm wrestle.
speak;Alexis; Well, I bet I can take down more bandits than you!
speak;Sonia; Heh, I'd like to see you try, blondie!
